result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John A. Soung

records.addlTxt:
10:01 AM cases 22CM74, 22CM162, 22CM417, 22CM604 called. Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant John A. Soung not in court, in custody at Eau Claire County Jail.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for John A. Soung. Attorney Rivard requested the defendant not be brought over as he is requests a new return date.
Hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:08 AM cases 22CM604, 22CM162, 22CM74, 22CM417 called. Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for John A. Soung. Defendant is currently in custody in Eau Claire County Jail, but Attorney Rivard asked that he not be brought over.
Hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:55 AM cases 22CM162, 22CM417 and 22CM74 called. Prosecuting Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John A. Soung in court with Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard. Attorney Rivard states he has not had time to meet with Defendant to discuss cases and requests a new date.
Hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level. 
No use or possession of dangerous weapons.
(Covers 22CM74, 22CM162, 22CM417)

(11:11 AM cases 22CM74, 22CM162, 22CM417 called.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant John A. Soung appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by video for John A. Soung. 
Court orders the warrants are quashed.
Defendant waives formal reading of the complaint in 22CM417.
State requests $250.00 cash bond and cites reasoning. Attorney Anderson requests signature bond and cites reasoning.
Court orders $250.00 signature bond with conditions.
Defendant updates address with the Court.
Hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:11 AM cases 22CM74, 22CM162, 22CM417 called. Prosecuting attorney Loralee Clark in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John A. Soung not in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for John A. Soung. 
Warrants are ordered in all files.
Initial appearance on June 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Case called at 11:47 AM.
Defendant John A. Soung not in court.  Attorney Monica Fallon appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin.
State notes the Defendant has a RTN date set for other matters on 6/2/22 at 9:30 AM and requests this case go in at that time. Court so orders.
